## showSaveDialog() function

Shows a save dialog

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function showSaveDialog(options: SaveDialogOptions): Promise<String[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [SaveDialogOptions](./nwjs-dialog.savedialogoptions.md) | Save dialog options |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;String\[\]&gt;

An array of file paths chosen by the user.

## Remarks

This method creates a temporary `<input>` and triggers `click` event to shows a save dialog.

## Example


```js
const fs = require("fs");
const { showSaveDialog } = require("nwjs-dialog");
showSaveDialog({
  nwworkingdir: process.cwd(),
  nwsaveas: "1.txt",
  accept: "audio/*,video/*,image/*,.txt"
}).then(([filePath]) => {
  fs.writeFileSync(filePath, "Hello");
});
```
